[ Test 1: Type Conversion ]
    FLOAT 10000000_00100000_00000000_00000000 is converted into TFP   100_00000001_00000000
    INT   00000000_00000000_01000000_00000000 is converted into TFP   010_00110100_00000000
    TFP   100_00000001_00000000 is converted into FLOAT 10000000_00100000_00000000_00000000
    TFP   010_00110100_00000000 is converted into INT   00000000_00000000_01000000_00000000

[ Test 2: Addition ]
    100_00000001_00000000 + 010_00110100_00000000 = 010_00110100_00000000

[ Test 3: Multiplication ]
    100_00000001_00000000 * 010_00110100_00000000 = 100_00110100_00000000
